[[File:MINECON 2016 Logo.png|thumb|Official logo]]
'''MINECON 2016''' was a [[MINECON|''Minecraft'' convention]] held at the Anaheim Convention Center in Anaheim, California, USA, from September 24 to 25, 2016. It marked the final in-person MINECON event before the series transitioned to an online format.

== Announcement ==
On March 7, 2016, Mojang announced that MINECON 2016 would take place in Anaheim, California, USA, from September 24–25.<ref>{{Ytl|1nP328vm5ik|MINECON 2016 Announcement|Mojang|March 7, 2016}}</ref> The official [https://minecon.minecraft.net event website] launched on April 18, 2016, featuring countdowns to ticket sales and links to discounted hotel accommodations.<ref name="hotel">{{citation|url=https://registration.experientevent.com/ShowMCO161/Flow/ATTENDEE#/registrant//Dashboard/|title=MINECON 2016 Hotel Booking Portal|website=Experient|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160421120000/registration.experientevent.com|archive-date=April 21, 2016}}</ref>

On August 12, 2016, Mojang developers teased announcements related to the ''[[Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' API during the event.<ref>{{tweet|searge|764033531223896064|There will be news about the API at Minecon. I'll talk about the things I'm working on and what our plans are. But no more details for now.|August 12, 2016}}</ref><ref>{{reddit|4xcq9m|comment=d6fzvrt|user=grum|text=*one|date=August 13, 2016}}</ref>

== Location ==
Anaheim Convention Center<br>Location of Anaheim Convention Center: 800 West Katella Avenue, Anaheim, California<ref>http://www.anaheim.net/1117/Anaheim-Convention-Center-Arena</ref><br>Location within the ACC for MINECON 2016 are Exhibit Halls A and D. The recommended entrance is through Exhibit Hall E, on the lower level.

== Tickets ==
Tickets went on sale in two batches on May 6 and 7, 2016, priced at $160 (US) each. Each batch offered 6,000 tickets, totaling 12,000 available passes.<ref name="2016Tix">{{citation|url=https://www.mojang.com/2016/04/minecon-2016-tickets|title=MINECON 2016 Tickets|website=Mojang|date=April 18, 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160421093159/http://www.mojang.com/2016/04/minecon-2016-tickets|archive-date=April 21, 2016}}</ref> Purchasers received access to discounted hotel bookings through an official portal.

== Event highlights ==
During the convention, Mojang unveiled the [[Exploration Update]] (later released as ''[[Minecraft]]'' version 1.11), which introduced new features such as [[woodland mansion]]s and [[shulker]]s. Panels included developer discussions, gameplay previews, and community workshops. Additional activities included build competitions, costume contests, and meet-and-greets with Mojang staff.
